comment: Export to JSON plugin for PHPMyAdmin

data.description: Al Onwan Al Mumayaz is a top Libyan company specializing in importing cars and spare parts from the U.S., handling everything from auctions to shipping and customs, providing fast, reliable, and transparent service to deliver high-quality vehicles to every client.

Meditech Group is a leading Egyptian company that manufactures and supplies advanced medical equipment for hospitals and home use, including ECG machines, patient monitors, defibrillators, ultrasound devices, and fetal monitoring tools. They provide innovative and reliable healthcare solutions across the Middle East and North Africa.

Al Aseel General Services is a Libyan company offering a wide range of professional services, including administrative, financial, legal, business support, printing, transportation, maintenance, and insurance services. They aim to support individuals, local and foreign businesses, and investors with high-quality and reliable solutions.
Founded in 2006, China. Specializes in motorcycles and engines, including design, production, sales, and support. Produces hundreds of thousands of units annually and sells globally.

INVT Electric is a Chinese company founded in 2002 that focuses on industrial automation and energy power solutions. It develops and manufactures products such as inverters, drives, and power systems, serving industries like automation, energy, transportation, and electric vehicles.

Tianjin Tiankang Metal Products Co., Ltd. is a manufacturer based in Tianjin, China, specializing in **metal fences, welded wire mesh, and related wire products. The company provides high-quality customized metal mesh solutions using advanced automation equipment.

Zhejiang Weichi Light Industry Machinery Co., Ltd. is a Chinese manufacturer based in Zhoushan, Zhejiang, specializing in can filling and sealing machines for beverages, foods, and sauces. Founded in 1999, it provides high-speed, customized equipment and has helped develop national standards for can seaming technology.

GUI ZHOU CORF Technology Co., Ltd. is a Chinese manufacturer of transmission parts, including chains, sprockets, and gears. The company provides power transmission system solutions and exports its products worldwide, serving industries across Europe, the Americas, and Asia.

Sacred Sun Technology is a Chinese manufacturer and exporter of machinery, including remote-controlled lawn mowers, mini excavators, crawler dumpers, and loaders. The company focuses on quality, innovation, and customer satisfaction, aiming to become a global leader in machinery manufacturing.

Alibaba Cloud, founded in 2009, is the cloud computing and AI technology subsidiary of the Alibaba Group. The company provides a wide range of cloud services including cloud servers, databases, big data, AI, security, and storage solutions. Alibaba Cloud aims to offer stable, secure, and scalable cloud infrastructure to businesses and developers worldwide. It has data centers in multiple regions and serves clients in over 200 countries and regions.

Founded in 2002, Nantong Zhuoyue Accurate Fitting Co., LTD manufactures various types of springs, including compression, tension, torsion, agricultural machinery, and elevator springs. The company serves industries such as agriculture, construction, elevators, automobiles, and machinery, with over 20 years of experience and ISO-certified quality standards.

Taizhou Tianyang Electrical Co., LTD specializes in designing and manufacturing pressure tanks for pump systems. With over 30 years of experience in mold design and production, the company produces tanks ranging from 0.5 to 1500 liters and working pressures from 4 to 25 bar. Their products are exported internationally, and they offer custom design services.

Oceanflex specializes in the production and export of fire hoses, lay flat hoses, and PVC hoses. Established in 2003, the company has its own factory covering nearly 20,000 square meters and produces over 6 million meters of fire hose and 15 million meters of lay flat hose annually. The company serves over 130 countries and emphasizes efficiency, after-sales service, and long-term client partnerships.

Fengyuan specializes in high-performance environmental PVC hoses and PVC modified materials. Established in 2011, the company produces kitchen hoses, garden hoses, and air tool hoses, and holds multiple patents and international certifications (NSF, KTW, W270, ACS, WRAS). It focuses on R&D, innovation, and large-scale production with 30 extrusion lines, serving domestic and international clients.

Taili Machinery specializes in manufacturing drill presses, lathes, sanders, and industrial motors. The company operates a modern factory with advanced production equipment and ISO9001-certified quality control, serving clients in over 27 countries. Taili emphasizes innovation, quality, and customer satisfaction.

Zhejiang Fuda Rubber makes and sells rubber conveyor belts for industries like mining, construction, and transportation. The company was founded in 1989, has 280 employees, covers 35,000 square meters, and exports to over 60 countries. It focuses on quality, technology, and customer service.

Yueqing Jiesheng Tools has over 30 years of experience in manufacturing and trading drill bits and other hardware tools. The company produces hammer drill bits, twist drill bits, masonry drill bits, router bits, hole saws, and saw blades. Its products are sold globally, especially in Europe, North America, South America, Africa, and Asia. The company emphasizes research and development, customization, and intelligent factory management.

data.company_name: Guangzhou Zhaoji Instrument & Meter Manufacturing Co., Ltd.
data.description:
Guangzhou Zhaoji Instrument & Meter Manufacturing Co., Ltd. is a professional manufacturer of smart water meters in China. Since 2002, the company has focused on producing NB-IoT water meters, ultrasonic water meters, remote reading meters, prepaid meters, and mechanical water meters.
Zhaoji provides reliable smart metering solutions for residential, commercial, and industrial water management, supported by advanced R&D, patented technology, and modern production facilities. The company is known for high-quality products, stable performance, and complete IoT water metering systems.

data.company_name: Wudi Kefeng Stainless Steel Products Co., Ltd.
data.description:
Wudi Kefeng Stainless Steel Products Co., Ltd. is a professional manufacturer of stainless steel quick couplings, pipe fittings, valves, flanges, rigging, and marine hardware. Founded in 2006 and certified with ISO 9001:2000, the company combines design, production, machining, and global sales.
With advanced precision casting lines and CNC equipment, Kefeng delivers high-quality stainless steel components used in marine transport, petrochemicals, food processing, pharmaceuticals, paper manufacturing, and industrial machinery. The company exports to more than 30 countries across Europe, America, Africa, Latin America, and Southeast Asia.

data.company_name: Taizhou Huangyan JMT Mould Co., Ltd.
data.description: Guangzhou Zhaoji Instrument and Meter Manufacturing Co Ltd is a china based company that designs and produces high quality measuring instruments and meters. The company provides reliable and cost effective products for industrial and engineering use. It focuses on stable performance, long service life, and strict quality control to meet global market needs.

data.company_name: Tongda Auto Maintenance Equipment Co Ltd
data.description: A china based company that makes auto maintenance equipment including wheel balancers, tire changers and lifts. The company provides stable performance, long service life and reliable after service.
A turkey based company that provides communication technology solutions and software products for industrial and commercial use.
A turkey based company that provides fabrication services and equipment for water and wastewater treatment, energy, chemicals, and industrial processes worldwide.

Ozdemir Makine provides new and used printing machines, pre press, offset press, post press, press equipment and spare parts. The company serves customers in Turkey, Germany and globally, offering high quality machinery and professional service.
Turak Endustriyel Mutfak provides industrial kitchen equipment including cooling systems, preparation machines, ovens, grills, coffee machines, dishwashers, and stainless steel products.

Humel Industrial provides maintenance and repair services for commercial kitchen and food industry equipment. They offer authorized services for multiple brands including Oztiryakiler, Fagor, Maksan, Atalay, Kayalar, Greenoks, Ndustrio, Crystal, Myco Teknik, Simag, Arisco, Edesa, Adona, Alveo, Electrolux, Inoksan, Mayapaz, Miele, Tolon, Winterhalter, Zanussi, Alectra, Brema, Unox, Classeq, Comenda, Elettrobar, Hobart, Hoshizaki, Lainox, Manitowoc, Mareno, Portabianco, S2000, Mateka, Profinox, Vital, Karacasan, Gorkem Endustriyel, Bykitchen, Pimak, Frozy, Fimak Firin, Coreca, Dampak, Hozhizaki, Castel, Kef, La Cimbali, Menumaster, Rational, Robot Coupe, Salva, Samixir, Santos, Scotsman, Sengun Makine, Senox, Serbetto, Vitamix.

Description: Breeze offers affordable and high-quality clothing for babies and children. Their stores provide a wide range of products including outfits for girls and boys (0-16 years), newborn clothing (0-1 year), sleepwear and innerwear (0-14 years), and accessories such as shoes, hats, socks, and scarves. Breeze ensures a convenient shopping experience with multiple store locations, customer service support, and easy access to online promotions and campaigns.

ABB Turkey is a leading technology company collaborating closely with customers in the public, industrial, transportation, and infrastructure sectors to drive industrial digitalization and create value. With local production facilities and offices in Istanbul, Kocaeli, Ankara, Izmir, Bursa, and Adana, ABB Turkey employs approximately 800 people and exports to over 70 countries. ABB provides sustainable energy-efficient solutions, industrial automation, robotics, electrification, and digital products and services under ABB Ability.

Artemis Treatment is a leading company providing wastewater treatment plants, recovery systems, and environmental management solutions. We offer advanced technologies including Membrane Bioreactors (MBR) and seawater treatment systems, alongside chemical treatment, measurement, and analysis services. Our projects span industrial facilities, ports, and municipal applications. Artemis Treatment emphasizes sustainable solutions, quality service, and customer-focused consulting for efficient water management.

AN-EL Key & Electrical Appliances, founded in 1972, specializes in producing electrical components for the white goods industry. Our products include Rotary Switches, Rocker Switches, Slide Switches, Neon Indicators, and various small plastic and metal parts. With 47 years of experience, we serve worldwide markets, exporting to 34 countries. Our products hold VDE, KEMA, ENEC certificates, and the company is certified with ISO 9001. Environmental management complies with EN ISO 14001, and Occupational Health and Safety is certified under ISO 45001

Altinisik Kimya is a leading chemical and pharmaceutical packaging company based in Istanbul, Turkey. Established in 1992, the company specializes in secondary packaging for pharmaceuticals, ensuring high quality and compliance with GMP standards. With modern facilities in Tuzla and Celiktepe, Altinisik Kimya operates with a daily capacity of 150,000 packages, providing innovative, reliable, and safe solutions for the pharmaceutical industry.

Atilim Makine is a leading manufacturer of LPG filling plants, compressors, cylinders, and related equipment. Based in Istanbul, Turkey, the company combines decades of experience with innovative engineering to deliver safe and efficient LPG solutions. Exporting to over 40 countries across 4 continents, Atilim Makine provides high-quality products designed for performance, safety, and sustainability.

Bimeks Celik, part of the Italian Rodacciai Group, has over 30 years of experience in the production and supply of quality steels. With a strong technical capacity and wide product range, the company provides high-quality steels to various industries in Turkey and abroad, including household appliances, automotive, medical, and defense. Committed to international standards, Bimeks Celik holds multiple certifications demonstrating its reliability, competence, and dedication to quality service.

Gencer Kasa designs and manufactures truck bodies tailored to your vehicle's dimensions without reducing carrying capacity. We focus on durability, fuel efficiency, and high-quality construction to provide reliable and long-lasting solutions for transportation needs.

Mara Cosmetics specializes in beauty and personal care products, including face care, makeup, and wellness solutions. We offer high-quality items designed to enhance skincare routines and cosmetic applications, providing safe and effective products for daily use.

Kosedag has over 45 years of experience providing solutions in more than 80 countries. The company specializes in integrating physical and electronic environmental safety and offers advanced products such as metal coatings, hot-dip galvanization, eco-friendly chemical washing, nano coatings, and electrostatic polyester or PVC coated materials for maximum corrosion resistance and durability.

Maide Homemade Food & Meatballs offers a unique meatball experience in Kadikoy, Istanbul. Their menu features a variety of meatballs prepared with special recipes and carefully selected ingredients, alongside pasta dishes, burgers, salads, and rich breakfast options. The restaurant combines traditional flavors with creative touches, ensuring an unforgettable culinary journey.

Elektronik Ticaret Dairesi Baskanligi is a governmental institution under the Ministry of Trade in Turkey. It oversees e-commerce regulation, site registrations, and the implementation of electronic commercial laws. The organization provides guidance, training, and updates for businesses and consumers about the digital marketplace, e-commerce legislation, and global e-commerce trends.

Ugur Maksan was founded in 1975 in Bayrampasa as Ugur Makine Imalat Sanayi. In the early 1990s, it shifted focus from manufacturing to trading various industrial equipment. The company specializes in the buying and selling of conventional and CNC machine tools and offers a wide range of machinery trade services.

Bilteks was founded in 1989 by Dursun Bilgin. The second generation, Ali Bilgin and Fatih Bilgin, took over management. Bilteks specializes in hosiery production with state-of-the-art machinery, producing up to 2 million pairs of socks monthly. The production site is in Kirklareli, and headquarters in Istanbul organizes exports to Europe, including England, France, and Germany. Bilteks focuses on quality, innovation, and production according to European social standards.

A company specializing in medical uniforms, chef clothing, workwear, waiter uniforms, and security clothing. Offers fast shipping, secure shopping, and a wide range of professional apparel. Based in Istanbul Turkey.

HugeDomains is a leading provider of premium domain names offering over four million domains with competitive prices and personalized customer service. The company provides secure shopping, fast domain delivery, financing options, and a 30 day money back guarantee. HugeDomains has been online since 2005 and is based in Denver Colorado.

Nevra Textile is a textile company that produces garments and textile products with international quality standards. The company focuses on technological innovation and provides solutions for customers in both domestic and international markets.
Offers stylish high quality womens clothing wholesale collections. Seasonal designs updated with fashion trends. Affordable prices and safe fast shopping options. Merter showroom.
Wholesale and retail denim clothing. Located in Merter, Istanbul. Offers high-quality jeans.
Family-owned jeans and textile company since 1975. Offers creative solutions in fashion and textile industry, following trends and market needs.
Specializes in evening and bridal dresses. Offers online appointments for wedding dresses. Located in Bakirkoy Istanbul. Stylish modern collections for brides and special occasions.

Modern and elegant modest clothing brand for stylish women. Offers high quality dresses, sets, and outerwear made from carefully selected fabrics. Collections suit daily wear and special occasions. Timeless designs with accessible pricing.
Modern womens clothing brand offering dresses, sets, outerwear, and seasonal collections. Focuses on stylish and elegant designs for daily and special occasions.
Wholesale and retail womens clothing brand specializing in evening dresses. Offers high-quality fabrics, stylish and fashionable designs for boutiques and global buyers. Located in Sisli Istanbul.

Oliven is a catering company with thirty eight years of experience providing mass meal production services. Since 2008 the company has operated in its own food production facility in Tuzla Istanbul following ISO standards. It offers on site meal production and transported meal services prepared by professional staff using modern equipment. The company prepares customized monthly menus according to client requirements and delivers food safely and consistently.

Onallar Ltd is a manufacturing company established in 1978 producing spare parts for grass mowers and combine harvesters. The products are exported to many European and Middle Eastern countries. The company maintains a large product range and can manufacture items based on customer samples. With a focus on quality and honesty Onallar invests in modern technology and operates a modern machinery park producing products under the Onallar and Gold brands.

Only Fresh is a cold pressed juice producer in Turkey and the first in the region to use high pressure processing technology. The company offers a range of natural juices made to preserve freshness and taste and aims to deliver high quality beverages using innovative production methods.

Rchemie International is a global supplier and manufacturer of chemical raw materials with decades of combined experience. The company provides distribution manufacturing logistics and technical support services to deliver high quality chemical solutions. Rchemie partners with global brands and offers tailored products for industries such as coatings personal care plastics rubber additives construction chemicals emulsions flavors fragrances and food ingredients.

HTL is a technology focused company established in 1993 specializing in clean room systems dry rooms and high biosafety laboratories. The company designs and manufactures gas tight systems pass boxes dampers and hydrogen peroxide sterilization systems. HTL is known for delivering modern reliable and customer focused solutions.

Yapraksan is a masterbatch producer offering color and additive solutions for the plastics industry. The company manufactures masterbatch in granule and micro granule form providing consistent coloration and functional additives for thermoplastic polymers. With long term industry experience and a specialized team Yapraksan aims to deliver high quality service and reliable solutions for customer needs.

Vines Makina is a manufacturer founded in 2022 in Istanbul Tuzla OSB specializing in vehicle mounted hydraulic cranes and man lifting platforms. The company focuses on high performance durable and innovative crane systems supported by modern production technologies and technical expertise. Vines Makina offers manufacturing technical service and spare parts solutions for a wide range of crane and platform products.

VSY Biotechnology GmbH is a biotechnology and medical device company specializing in ophthalmology, aesthetics, and orthobiologics. Their product range includes intraocular lenses (IOLs), cartridge injector systems, viscoelastics for surgery, specialized aesthetic HA formulas, and IA-HA solutions for pain relief. The company focuses on innovation, safety, and high-quality medical products used globally, though not all products are available in every country.

Yilmaz Bardak Mak. Ltd. Sti is a precision machining company established in 1971 in Istanbul Elmadag. The company specializes in manufacturing high quality turned parts for automotive cement energy and other industries. Their production focuses on precision functionality efficiency and low defect rates, providing customers with reliable and durable components.

Umut Ticaret is an e-commerce company based in Gaziantep, Turkey. The company operates an online marketplace offering a wide range of products including small home appliances, kitchenware, electronics, personal care items, and TV audio systems. Umut Ticaret focuses on customer convenience with easy ordering, payment, and delivery solutions, along with responsive customer service.

TommyLife is a Turkish online brand active on Instagram, promoting products with seasonal campaigns and discounts. The company primarily engages with customers through social media marketing and e-commerce sales.

Zamur Tekstil Ltd operates the ZMR Sportswear brand, offering clothing and sportswear products. The company promotes its products primarily through Instagram and provides phone contact for orders and inquiries.
Wholesale textile company based in Istanbul, offering regular fit pike and various T-shirt products.
UK-based retail brand offering clothing, footwear, and accessories, with customer service and product support available online.
Textile printing company offering Emprime, T-shirt, fabric, and logo printing with high daily production capacity and over 20 years of experience.

A knitting and textile manufacturing company in Istanbul, producing high-quality fabrics with modern machinery, strong industry experience, and a long-standing commitment to quality and sustainability.
Outdoor and sporting goods company specializing in lightweight, breathable, and affordable rainwear trusted by outdoor enthusiasts across the United States.
A fashion and textile design company based in Istanbul, specializing in clothing production, wholesale, and international trade.
Leading Turkish textile company specializing in knitted fabrics and yarn production, offering high-quality cotton, polyester, viscose, tencel, bamboo, and blended fibers for various industries.
Online fashion store offering a wide range of clothing for men, women, and children, including t-shirts, shirts, shorts, blouses, dresses, and seasonal outlet collections.
Family-owned New York retail store since 1922, offering athletic gear, professional and industrial uniforms, workwear, and in-house embroidery & screen-printing services.
Semshali offers a wide range of home textiles and fabric collections, including Bella, Luna, Sahra, Rumi, and Bohem series, providing quality products with various designs, colors, and patterns.

Adrian Sportswear, founded in 1979 in Laleli, Istanbul, produces premium sportswear combining quality, comfort, and modern design. The brand emphasizes craftsmanship, sustainable production, and accessible luxury for modern urban lifestyles.

Description: Germirli, founded initially as "Onder Gomlek Evi" in 1942, produces premium mens shirts and knitwear using sustainable, natural fabrics. The brand emphasizes quality, craftsmanship, and customer service, offering a wide range of polo shirts, casual wear, and tailored clothing.

The company produces and sells men's T-shirts and sweatshirts. They are located in Zeytinburnu, Istanbul, Turkey. The rest of the text about the company history is a standard Lorem Ipsum placeholder and is not a genuine description.

FXD (Function By Design) creates purpose-built, technical workwear and work boots. Their products include Hi-Vis fleece, work boots (composite toe, waterproof), work pants (stretch, cuffed, lightweight), and jackets. The company focuses on durability and design, using sustainable materials like REPREVE recycled polyester.

May Tekstil produces specialized technical clothing for professionals including military (Asker), fire services , police (Polis), and foresters. The company is located in Pendik, Istanbul, and operates on weekdays.

Vivento Tekstil is a dynamic fashion company that focuses on producing stylish and high-quality textile products. They follow fashion trends closely and operate with an expert team, prioritizing customer satisfaction. Their process includes designing new collections based on market needs, manufacturing using advanced techniques, and rigorous quality control before presenting products to customers.

Freysport is a professional sportswear uniform manufacturer specializing in durable, high-quality, and stylish athletic clothing for teams and individual athletes. Their extensive product range includes uniforms for football, basketball, volleyball, cycling (bicycle jerseys), as well as tracksuits and shorts. They offer personal printing, custom designs for teams, same-day shipping on stock items, and guarantee original products.

Can Tekstil, uluslararasi tasarimcilarla isbirligi yaparak yilda iki kez (Sonbahar-Kis ve Ilkbahar-Yaz) kumas koleksiyonlari hazirlayan bir Can Group sirketidir. Sanat, teknoloji ve yeniligi harmanladigi kumaslarini dunya capindaki onemli fuarlarda sergilemektedir. Sirket, AR-GE Merkezi ve surdurulebilirlik konularina onem vermektedir. Merkezi Istanbul'da, fabrikasi ise Tekirdag'da bulunmaktadir.

Felix Nonwovens is a manufacturer and supplier specializing in 100 percent Polypropylene (PP) spunbond nonwoven fabrics, films, laminated, and filled granule products. Their extensive product range serves multiple industries, including medical and hygiene (surgical gowns and drapes, masks, wipes), construction (water insulation membranes, housewrap, roofing underlayment), packaging (HFPO film, CPP film, block bottom bags), and automotive (car cover fabrics, lightweight composites). They focus on high performance materials like SFS and SMMS laminates and ultra fine fiber spunbond nonwovens.

Kazee, established since 1993 and part of Reel Tekstil, is a leading global supplier of wholesale womens clothing, specializing in luxury, high quality, and stylish collections, including knitwear, tracksuits, blouses, shirts, dresses, trousers, and plus size apparel. They operate from a production facility in Topkapi, Istanbul, and have stores in Laleli, Merter, and Osmanbey. They offer fast, reliable worldwide shipping (3 to 5 business days) and are committed to serving fashion boutiques globally.

Kuloglu Tekstil is an online wholesale supplier of innerwear, pajamas, hosiery, thermal wear, and swimwear, including Hasema and modest swimwear, for women, men, and children. They distribute products from over 200 popular brands, such as Tutku, Seher Yildizi, Berrak, and Penti. They offer fast, secure payment, credit card installment options, and free shipping on orders over 5000 TL. Their focus is on wholesale supply to businesses.

Mega Life is a Turkish company established in 1997, specializing in wholesale womens clothing. They are known for maintaining high product quality, following current fashion trends, and producing their collections internally, from design to production. They aim to represent the stylish woman who seeks comfort in daily life. Mega Life exports its products to many countries, including Iraq, Libya, Iran, Egypt, the USA, France, Germany, the UK, Russia, and many others. They focus on customer satisfaction, fast shipping, and creative designs.

Catz Kids is a clothing company specializing in apparel for children, boys and girls, ranging from 6 months to 13 years, and also features a collection for women and adults. They sell various clothing types, including jumpsuits and overalls, trousers, top and bottom sets, coats, and shirts, using fabrics like velvet, denim, linen, modal, cotton, and viscose. They are located in Karsiyaka, Izmir, and offer free shipping on orders over 3000 TL and easy returns within 30 days.

Erkan Tekstil is a textile company that specializes in the sale and export of various fabric types. Their product range includes seasonal fabrics, summer and winter fabrics, fabrics for printing, woven fabrics, and knitted fabrics. They are noted for their experienced staff, high quality products, good customer service, and continuous adoption of technology. They operate from a store in Zeytinburnu, Istanbul.

data.company_name: Ozmetsan Metal Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. (Ozmetsan)
data.description: Ozmetsan is a family owned company established in 1956 in Izmir, Turkey, with over 60 years of experience in the stainless steel and iron steel sector. They are a major supplier with a rich product stock, including stainless steel sheet, pipe, profile, flat bar, rod, and fittings, as well as black sheet. They offer extensive value added services such as CNC plasma cutting, CNC laser cutting, press brake bending, and guillotine cutting. They prioritize product quality, honesty, and safe business practices.

Alfa Ambalaj is a company operating in the plastic packaging sector. It has a vision to increase its presence in domestic and international markets and to be the number one choice in the sector with its experienced staff. The company aims to meet customer demands and ensure customer loyalty by continuously improving product and service quality. Its product range includes manufactured and imported products. It gives importance to quality, business ethics, and occupational safety policies.

Akepak Ambalaj is a company founded in 2012 by Kenan Turan, who has been involved in the flexible packaging (FIBC - Flexible Intermediate Bulk Container) sector since 1996. The company specializes in manufacturing and selling various types of industrial sacks and bags, including Big Bag sacks, Q Bag sack types, liner bags, ventilated sacks, and other types like woven sacks and container bags. They hold BRC, ISO 22000, ISO 9001, and ISO 45001 certifications.

Uzman Kardan specializes in the maintenance, manufacturing, and repair of all types of universal joint shafts (kardan shafts). They use domestic and original spare parts for repairs and new production. The company uses an expert staff, advanced machinery, and technology to restore shafts to their original condition, including precise balancing. They provide reliable, high-quality, and end-to-end turnkey services for the Automotive and Industrial sectors.

Bulent Alcan offers bespoke and custom tailoring services for mens formal and special occasion wear. Their services include custom tailoring for shirts, suits, groom suits, and tuxedos. The business is located in Alsancak, Izmir.

Park Moda is an apparel company specializing in womens clothing, including blouses and other collections, such as Marin, Lova, and Special Edition. Their products are made from materials like 100 percent cotton and are offered in sizes ranging from 34 to 44. They are located in Gungoren, Istanbul, and provide customer support services such as easy returns, shipping and delivery tracking, and a focus on customer relations.

ABBRA is a clothing and accessories retailer specializing in bags, outerwear, including coats, jackets, and monts, tops, bottoms, and suit models. They operate both through an online platform and a physical store located in Altinordu, Ordu. They offer incentives such as free shipping on orders over 1000 TL and a 5 percent discount for members. Customer reviews praise the warmth and quality of their outerwear and the stylish cuts of their products.

Boutique Oz is a retailer and showroom selling various womens clothing products, including innerwear, tunics, shirts, knitwear, sweatshirts, trousers, skirts, trench coats, coats, cardigans, jackets, suits, dresses, shawls, and scarves. They have a physical showroom located in Obakoy Is Merkezi, Zeytinburnu, Maltepe, Istanbul. They operate on weekdays from 10:00 to 18:00 and offer free shipping on orders of 2500 TL and above.

Pierlucci is an online retailer selling womens shoes, including everyday shoes, heels, sandals, boots, and over the knee boots. They offer services such as 24 hour shipping, free shipping on orders over 250 dollars, easy returns, secure credit card payments, and 100 percent customer satisfaction. Customer service operates on weekdays from 09:30 to 18:30 and on Saturdays from 09:30 to 12:30.

Pelin Yildiz Butik is a fashion brand specializing in stylish, modern, and high quality womens clothing. They offer a wide range of apparel, including sets, dresses, outerwear, bottoms, and tops, catering to different styles and body types. The boutique is a prominent destination for womens fashion in Mersin, and they operate an online store offering free shipping on orders over 2500 TL, easy returns, and installment payment options.

OPPO Moda is a womens clothing retailer operating online and through a showroom. They have a wide product range, including outerwear, tops, bottoms, dresses, suits, and accessories. The company offers both seasonal trends and special production collections. They prioritize customer satisfaction by providing free shipping on orders over 2500 TL, easy exchanges, transparent shipping, and delivery within 24 hours.

Esmeralda is a luxury Turkish brand established in 2010 under the parent company Sengul Deri Tekstil, founded in 1997. The company specializes in producing high quality cashmere coats for women, using Italian and Turkish fabrics, leather, and original furs, such as arctic fox and mink. They have a 2000 square meter factory with 200 employees, and a production capacity of about 7000 pieces per week, or 300000 per year. They actively export to over 20 countries, including Russia, Ukraine, China, Azerbaijan, Central Asian countries, and EU countries.

IDIL Tekstil is a company operating in the textile sector, emphasizing a commitment to quality defined by teamwork, efficiency, and competitiveness. Their main goal is customer loyalty, achieved by producing innovative products that exceed expectations. The company also prioritizes environmental protection, employee health, happiness, and improvement of the working environment. They hold several ISO certifications, including 9001, 14001, 45001, 10002, and 27001, and are a SEDEX member.

Giovanni Fratelli is a brand specializing in mens shirts, focusing on modern styles that offer both elegance and comfort. Their product categories include Classic Shirts, Slim Fit Shirts, Big Sizes, and Accessories. They offer unconditional returns and exchanges, safe shopping with 256 bit SSL certification, and certified products. Shipping fees are charged and vary by country. The online platform, giovannifratelli.com, is copyrighted by Profsin Communication Technologies Inc.

Gipas Tekstil is a leading wholesale company in the innerwear, socks, and lingerie sector since 1987. They distribute approximately 10000 products from over 100 brands, including Tutku, Berrak, NightLight, and Penti, for men, women, and children. They emphasize high quality fabrics such as cotton, bamboo, and modal. They offer wholesale customers advantages such as a 10 percent discount on purchases over 5000 TL, free shipping over 2500 TL, and up to 6 interest free installments on all credit cards. They guarantee 100 percent original products and secure shopping.

Vakkorama is a high end lifestyle and fashion brand offering collections for women, men, and junior customers, including apparel, shoes, bags, and lifestyle gadgets. They feature both their own designs and numerous international brands, such as RIXO, FUJIFILM, PARAJUMPERS, ALOHAS, ADIDAS, UGG, NEW BALANCE, and others. They also operate the Vakkorama Cafe, which offers dining services seven days a week from 10:00 to 22:00, with delivery available through the Fuudy App. The online shop provides free shipping on orders over 1500 TL, in store exchanges, and free, easy returns within 30 days of the invoice date.

This is an e commerce platform that retails apparel from various Turkish and international brands, including Massimo Donna, Miss Whence, Nuss, Setre, Miss Dalida, and NCL. Product categories include outerwear, tops, bottoms, and formal wear. The company offers customer promotions such as 4 interest free installments at the cash price on all new season products, free shipping, and specific sales events like the 11.11 discount. They have a list of physical stores, but the addresses are not provided. The website infrastructure is powered by Ikas E Ticaret.

HE QA is an international e commerce platform that ships worldwide. They offer customer service on weekdays from 8:30 to 17:30. The company provides a range of services, including secure shopping with 128 bit SSL and 3D Secure, shipping within 24 hours, installment payment options on all credit cards, and free returns within 14 days. They also handle wholesale inquiries and have physical stores, although the locations are not listed. The site is built on the T Soft e commerce infrastructure.

Canali SpA is a luxury Italian menswear brand specializing in refined aesthetic collections, including clothing, shoes, and accessories. They offer bespoke services through their Made to Measure program and seasonal capsule collections. The company emphasizes sustainability through its global initiative, Canali Care. Canali operates numerous physical boutiques worldwide and provides free standard shipping and complimentary returns on all orders. They also offer customers the option to book appointments.

Escetic Sport is an online retailer specializing in mens and womens sportswear and casual apparel. Their product range includes T shirts, including slim fit and cotton options, summer shorts for fitness or swimming, tracksuits, outerwear such as raincoats, jackets, and vests, as well as tunics and bags. They frequently run promotions, offering up to 80 percent discounts in the cart and free shipping on orders over 3000 TL. The company emphasizes fast and secure delivery, secure shopping with international security standards, customer satisfaction, and easy return and cancellation processes.

Pantamo Jeans is an apparel brand focused on denim products jeans jean jackets and casual wear for both Women and Men Other categories include shirts shorts skirts and new product lines The company operates an online shop features customer content using the hashtag denimonme and provides standard ecommerce services like order tracking FAQs and deliveryreturn options The platform also lists physical stores Stores but the locations are not providedFollow upHelp me with tools for cleaning up and formatting this text more professionally.Suggest ways to use this brand description within a website or marketing materials.

Vigoss is an online apparel retailer offering clothing for Men Women and Unisex categories Product types include skirts tracksuits esofman shirts gomlek and dresses elbise The company provides standard ecommerce features such as member login order tracking and a shopping cart system

DEN PARIS is an online womens fashion retailer operating under the legal entity OZUNALAN TEKSTIL They sell a wide range of clothing including dresses regular and formal abiye blouses shirts pants jeans palazzo krep velvet coats jackets kimonos and knitwear triko The company offers free shipping on orders over 1750 100 secure shopping installment plans for credit card purchases and a cash or credit card payment option at the door Kapida Odeme They are registered with the Turkish Ecommerce Information System ETBIS

BLK Jeans operating under the name Guc Tekstil is a company specializing in the design and production of trendy denim woven and knitted casual clothing Founded 30 years ago the company underwent significant renovations in 1994 updating its system and machinery to become a sector leader They offer trendy designs quality production using quality raw materials and prioritize customer satisfaction and cost policy They have a professional team ready for lastminute orders and client requirements
YSF Giyim is a retail fashion brand offering mens suits jackets shirts coats and accessories. The company focuses on quality fabrics stylish designs and modern collections for menswear shoppers.

The Point Collection is a retail fashion brand offering womens clothing bags dresses and accessories. The store features modern seasonal styles and provides customers with a variety of trendy fashion products.

Oksijen Uniform is a retail brand offering medical uniforms scrubs and workwear for women and men. The company provides fast shipping quality fabrics and reliable customer support for healthcare professionals.

This company offers seasonal clothing collections including jackets coats pants knitwear tshirts and accessories. The store focuses on retail and wholesale options and provides customers with a variety of fashion products.

SheShe is a retail fashion brand offering stylish and modern clothing sets dresses and accessories for girls and women. The company focuses on trendy seasonal collections and unique matching outfits with playful and colorful designs.

data.company_name: Zhejiang Feida Sanhe Home Products Co., Ltd.
data.description: Zhejiang Feida Sanhe Home Products Co. Ltd. is a manufacturing company specializing in plastic household items home accessories and kitchenware. Established in 1988 the company has over a thousand employees and exports products worldwide.

Zhejiang Kaside Technology Co. Ltd. is a professional manufacturer of electric and manual salt and pepper mills. The company produces kitchen utensils using stainless steel, acrylic, wood, bamboo, and plastic, with a factory area exceeding 20,000 square meters.

Luli Group started in 1985 and is a big company in China. They make steel pipes high quality forged steel wooden and smart home products. They also do import export business logistics renewable energy like solar and gas and help with water treatment and recycling. The company is one of Chinas top 500 companies and has received many national and local awards.

data.company_name: Foshan Gaoming Fullwins Hardware Products Co Ltd
data.description: The company specializes in manufacturing cast iron cookware and barbecue grills with multiple production centers including casting enamel and inspection facilities
The company is an artificial flowers factory and exporter in Tianjin China with a large showroom and annual production capacity of 500 containers exporting to many countries

The company is a professional manufacturer of new heating radiators in Tianjin China with a large production capacity covering steel pipe steel column copper aluminum and other series exporting domestically and internationally

Gold Sanitary Ware is a highend fullbath customization brand in China with extensive production facilities advanced machinery and over 200 skilled workers producing ceramic smart customized bathroom cabinets and hardware products

data.company_name: Tianjin Yihaiyuan International Trade Co Ltd
data.description: The company is a factory in Tianjin China producing artificial plants flowers and dry flowers with 500 workers covering design mold manufacturing injection molding and assembly with BSCI certification and MSDS certified raw materials

data.company_name: Jieyang Wanyeda Stainless Steel Industry Co Ltd
data.description: The company is a professional manufacturer of stainless steel cutlery and kitchenware in Jieyang Guangdong China with a large factory 15 production lines and specialized staff producing flatware cutlery and utensils for wholesale and retail markets

data.company_name: Jiangmen Yida Metal Products Co Ltd
data.description: The company is a professional manufacturer of coffee and tea kitchenware in Jiangmen Guangdong China with over 200 employees and 100 R&D personnel producing French presses Moka pots teapots whistling kettles coffee canisters and more with BSCI FDA ISO certification

KARINCA Logistics is a leading logistics service provider in Turkey offering international and domestic transportation project logistics energy logistics and e-commerce solutions with a focus on reliability efficiency and customized solutions for clients across industries
Birtug is a Turkish company representing multiple international brands and providing industrial solutions in sectors such as plastics and textiles Their offices are located in Ikitelli OSB Istanbul

Projet AS is the Turkey distributor of Markem Imaje offering coding marking and labeling solutions for industrial production lines including inkjet coding laser marking thermal transfer and automatic labeling systems to improve efficiency and quality of packaged products
